title: Exclusive Video & Competition : Weather Barn – The Boat Ride
body:
As we approach the weekend, we here at **Crack In The Road** can reveal the exclusive chance to watch the video to **Weather Barn**‘s newest single ‘**The Boat Ride**‘! We have been big fans of **Weather Barn** for quite some time and we’re delighted to be able to give you an early insight into this choppy guitar pop wonder!

To go along with this exclusive, we’re giving away, with kind thanks to **Weather Barn**, three goody bags of merchandise.

These will each include a **Weather Barn T-Shirt, Badge, Free Download of ‘The Boat Ride’** and **a Signed Copy of ‘Park Hands’.** This will all come packaged in **Weather Barn** wrapping organised exclusively by the band. To be one of the lucky three winners all we ask if that you go to our **[facebook page](http://www.facebook.com/crackintheroad),** ‘like’ us and then suggest us to as many friends as you want. After doing this much appreciated exercise, tell us who YOUR ideal Boat Ride would be with! We will run the competition over the weekend and the release date, with the winner being announced on the morning of the **29th March**. Good luck!

Now enough from me! I present **Weather Barn** with their new single, ‘**The Boat Ride**‘!
